I couldn't figure out a non-global way to set this (modeled on `FlutterTesterDevices.showFlutterTesterDevice`).  I tried to make it a property on a context override on `IOSWorkflow` but I would have needed to set it the context override only for the `attach` command in: 
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/e7b7ebc066c1b2a5aa5c19f8961307427e0142a6/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/runner/flutter_command_runner.dart#L232-L235
and
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/80668d20f86be0fefd9f210db0d23c4bb2d68d59/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/commands/attach.dart#L178-L179
and
https://github.com/flutter/flutter/blob/80668d20f86be0fefd9f210db0d23c4bb2d68d59/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/commands/attach.dart#L210-L213

Welcome suggestions to make this better.
static is fine, please no more context overrides
